meanings.sent1: The group of contemplatives sat quietly in the garden, deep in thought.

meanings.sent3: The contemplatives decided to meditate on the meaning of life while enjoying a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of contemplatives, each thought a flower blooming in silence.
meanings.sent5: The image of the contemplatives by the serene lake lingered in his mind long after he left.
